requirements.summary: Implement 5-second auto-advance for the homepage HeroSlider that loops, respects prefers-reduced-motion, and cleans up timers on unmount.
acceptanceCriteria: When the homepage hero banner is visible, the slide automatically advances every 5000ms.
After the final slide, the next auto-advance returns to the first slide.
The auto-advance interval is cleaned up on component unmount (no timers continue running after navigation).
If the user has enabled 'prefers-reduced-motion', auto-advance is disabled (the user can still navigate slides manually).

file_operations.description: Add an auto-rotation effect to advance slides every 5000ms, looping back to the first slide after the last. Gate auto-advance behind prefers-reduced-motion (disable when true), and ensure the interval is created only when the hero carousel is visible (e.g., via IntersectionObserver on the existing sliderRef) and always cleared on effect cleanup/unmount to prevent lingering timers after navigation. Keep all changes scoped to this file and do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
